channel.title: Fibonacci on Code World
channel.description: Recent content in Fibonacci on Code World

item.title: Tail Recursion
item.description: Code #include <iostream> using namespace std; int factorial(int n, int a){ if(n==0 || n==1){ return a; } return factorial(n-1,n*a); } int fibonacci(int n, int a, int b){ if(n == 0){ return a; } if(n == 1){ return b; } return fibonacci(n-1,b,a+b); } int main(){ cout<<factorial(5,1)<<endl; // cout<<fibonacci(5,0,1)<<endl; for(int i = 0; i <= 5; i++){ cout<<fibonacci(i,0,1)<<" "; } cout<<endl; return 0; } Output 120 0 1 1 2 3 5
